offices.title: Member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Georgia's 14th district
Member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Georgia's 9th district
Member of the Georgia House of Representatives from the 12th district
Member of the Georgia House of Representatives from the 10th district

statements.quote: Our [#TaxReform](https://twitter.com/hashtag/TaxReform?src=hash) framework turns the page on a complicated & broken tax system. It's simpler, flatter & fairer than the current tax code. It will put more money in the pockets of hard-working Americans. It also promotes economic growth & private-sector job creation by slashing the corporate tax rate – currently the highest in the developed world – and ensuring fair treatment for small businesses. Congress needs to get the final product to the president's desk as quickly as possible.
